title: Consult & Deliver
shortDescription: Bring in HR industry veterans who walk the talk.
description: Our consulting services bring decades of HR and recruitment expertise to help you navigate complex talent challenges. We don't just advise—we deliver results through actionable strategies and hands-on support.
benefits: 50+ years combined experience from senior leaders
Deep understanding of BFSI, SaaS, IT/ITES, and Consulting industries
Strategic talent acquisition planning and implementation
Custom solutions tailored to your organizational needs

title: Search & Select
shortDescription: From CXOs to junior staff, attract top talent who can join soon.
description: Our Search & Select service is designed to find and attract the best talent across all levels—from C-suite executives to junior professionals. We ensure candidates are ready to join quickly without compromising on quality.
benefits: Leadership hiring: CXOs, VPs, Heads of Departments
Lateral hiring: Mid-level to senior professionals
Volume hiring: Junior to mid-level positions at scale
Fast turnaround: Candidates ready to join within 2 weeks
Rigorous screening: Only the most relevant candidates presented

title: Staffing & Payroll
shortDescription: Get ready to deploy resources on short notice.
description: Our Staffing & Payroll services provide flexible workforce solutions for short-term projects, seasonal demands, or ongoing needs. We handle all compliance, payroll, and administrative tasks so you can focus on your business.
benefits: Contract staffing for short-term and project-based needs
Quick deployment: Resources ready on short notice
Flexible engagement models to suit your requirements
